name: Chautauqua
description: The most famous scrambles in Boulder including the First, Second, and Third Flatirons.
parking: Chautauqua parking lot. Often full and paid from Memorial Day to Labor Day. Can fall back to street parking if lot is full.

name: Hollyberry
description: A lesser-known area with some great scrambles.

name: NCAR
description: The National Center for Atmospheric Research area has some great scrambles.

name: Cragmoor
description: Cragmoor trailhead leads to a handful of scrambles, with the main being The Slab.
